entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet 6.x looks weird if I see screen_number of X11 - I think that DLLImport has problem... #70623
  • [API Proposal]: Add a way to get Xml documentation ID from Type and MemberInfo #70622
  • Assertion prop does not properly truncate stores to small-typed args #70607
  • JsonObject doesn't report duplicate keys until accessed #70604
  • [wasm] build `WasmAppHost` with `UseAppHost=false` #70603
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject can be reentrant on NativeAOT and deadlock #70453
  • Assertion failed 'divMod->OperGet() != GT_UMOD' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #68136
    7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Minor regression from optimizing 'a % b' #67983
    Future
  • Emit creates a try catch method call exception #70487
  • JIT: Optimize "X ^ 0" to "X" #65071
    7.0.0
  • [Linux][Arm64] Runtime test runs doesn't seem to respect build properties #65713
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndRemove<String> #61214
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions. #64381
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #66663
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #67595
    7.0.0
  • Application fails to start using System.Runtime.Experimental 6.0.1 with .NET 6.0.2 #65018
    6.0.x
  • Test `System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamNetworkStreamTest.SslStream_UnifiedHello_Ok` is failing on windows #70470
    7.0.0
  • Loading a .NET host in a C++ program seems to change exception handling behavior #70136
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix value numbering of HWI loads #70621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce allocations when using DataContractSerializer with SurrogateTypes #70620
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • disable ClientOptions_TargetHostNull_OK on Android #70619
    area-System.Net.Security, test-run-core
  • Omit calls to CCCryptorFinal #70618
    area-System.Security
  • Restore ArchivingUtils.AttemptSetLastWriteTime #70617
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • optRelopImpliesRelop experiments #70616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add markdown readme for System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #70610
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Build WasmAppHost with UseAppHost=false #70606
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Double to Decimal Conversion Refactor (WIP) #70602
    area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Fix nullability annotation of `ILGenerator.BeginCatchBlock`. #70615
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Better fix for nativeaot lock/typesystem reentrancy #70605
  • ARM64 - Always morph GT_MOD #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Unpin locals #70264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Skip X.509 extension copies where possible #70589
    area-System.Security
  • Remove some more unnecessary pragma warning disables #70583
    area-Meta
  • make SslStream_UnifiedHello_Ok test conditional #70472
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] A few more PowerPC cleanups #70576
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Propagate c++ unhandled exception to previous handler #70556
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use u8 in a few more places #70568
    area-Meta
  • [6.0] Modify thread pool thread counting to be a bit more defensive #70479
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.7
  • Windows/Arm64: Set flag for Atomics/Dp feature #70600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • Delete `GTF_ASSERTION_PROP_LONG` #70521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize expansion of indir cell addresses for CFG #70491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold System.Private.Reflection.Core into CoreLib #70545
    area-System.Reflection
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1819747 #70596
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Optimize `i % 2` #70599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Enable CSE for CLS/STR const handles #70580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Enable a subset of the gc_pin area optimizations. #70465
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #70591
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
  • Enable IDE0054 (Use compound assignment) #70564
    area-Meta
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Narrow cast fix #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Draft] Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt #70539
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable some previously failing WBT/AOT tests on windows #70595
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Cross module r2r rebased #70581
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
